Bash(python -m src.main add "Second todo" --description "This is a test description")

Bash(python -c "
from src.core.domain.todo import Todo
from src.core.ports.todo_repository import TodoRepository
from src.core.application.todo_service import TodoService
from src.infrastructure.repositories.file_todo_repository import FileTodoRepository

# Test the basic functionality
repo = FileTodoRepository(''test.json'')
service = TodoService(repo)

# Create a todo
todo = service.create_todo(''Test todo'', ''Test description'')
print(f''Created todo: {todo.title} with ID: {todo.id}'')

# Get the todo
retrieved = service.get_todo(todo.id)
print(f''Retrieved todo: {retrieved.title if retrieved else None}'')

# Update the todo
success = service.update_todo(todo.id, title=''Updated todo'')
print(f''Update successful: {success}'')

# List all todos
todos = service.get_all_todos()
print(f''Total todos: {len(todos)}'')

# Clean up test file
import os
if os.path.exists(''test.json''):
    os.remove(''test.json'')
")
Bash(python -m src.main add "Simple test todo" --description "Testing the simple implementation")

Bash(python -c "
from src.todo import TodoApp
app = TodoApp()

# Add a todo
todo = app.add_todo(''Test todo'', ''Test description'')
print(f''Added: {todo.title} (ID: {todo.id})'')

# List todos
todos = app.list_todos()
print(f''Total todos: {len(todos)}'')

# Complete the todo
app.complete_todo(1)
completed = app.list_todos(completed=True)
print(f''Completed todos: {len(completed)}'')

# Update the todo
app.update_todo(1, title=''Updated todo'')
updated = app.get_todo(1)
print(f''Updated title: {updated.title}'')

# Delete the todo
app.delete_todo(1)
remaining = app.list_todos()
print(f''Remaining todos: {len(remaining)}'')

print(''All functionality working correctly!'')
")

Bash(uv run python -c "
from src.todo import TodoApp
app = TodoApp()
todo = app.add_todo(''Test todo'', ''Test description'')
print(f''Added: {todo.title} (ID: {todo.id})'')
todos = app.list_todos()
print(f''Total todos: {len(todos)}'')
app.complete_todo(1)
completed = app.list_todos(completed=True)
print(f''Completed todos: {len(completed)}'')
app.update_todo(1, title=''Updated todo'')
updated = app.get_todo(1)
print(f''Updated title: {updated.title}'')
app.delete_todo(1)
remaining = app.list_todos()
print(f''Remaining todos: {len(remaining)}'')
print(''All functionality working correctly!'')
")

Bash(python -c "
from src.todo import TodoApp
from src.cli import TodoCLI

# Test that the classes can be imported and instantiated
app = TodoApp()
cli = TodoCLI()

print(''✓ TodoApp can be instantiated'')
print(''✓ TodoCLI can be instantiated'')

# Test basic functionality
todo = app.add_todo(''Test'', ''Test description'')
print(f''✓ Added todo: {todo.title} with ID {todo.id}'')

todos = app.list_todos()
print(f''✓ Listed todos: {len(todos)} todo(s) found'')

success = app.complete_todo(todo.id)
print(f''✓ Marked todo as completed: {success}'')

success = app.delete_todo(todo.id)
print(f''✓ Deleted todo: {success}'')

print(''✓ All core functionality working'')
")

Bash(python -c "
from src.todo import TodoApp
from src.cli import TodoCLI

# Test that the classes can be imported and instantiated
app = TodoApp()
cli = TodoCLI()

print(''SUCCESS: TodoApp can be instantiated'')
print(''SUCCESS: TodoCLI can be instantiated'')

# Test basic functionality
todo = app.add_todo(''Test'', ''Test description'')
print(f''SUCCESS: Added todo: {todo.title} with ID {todo.id}'')

todos = app.list_todos()
print(f''SUCCESS: Listed todos: {len(todos)} todo(s) found'')

success = app.complete_todo(todo.id)
print(f''SUCCESS: Marked todo as completed: {success}'')

success = app.delete_todo(todo.id)
print(f''SUCCESS: Deleted todo: {success}'')

print(''SUCCESS: All core functionality working'')
")
